title: Keep-It Handy Descaler Tablets All Purpose Pack of 4 x 20g Tablets (Packaging May Vary)
description: Product Description Keep it Handy Descaler tablets are effective and easy to use, leaving your household appliances sparkling. Ingredients Citric Acid <55%, AEO-9 <25%, Sodium gluconate <25%, Sodium silcate <7%, Sodium carbonate <7% Directions For regular descaling only one tablet is required, allow tablet to dissolve in approximately 1/2 litre fo cold water for up to 40 minutes. Once fully dissolved pour the solution into your kettle or the water compartment of your coffee maker, switch on and boil your kettle or coffee maker ensuring that the solution does not foam out. After descaling, refill your kettle and re-use with water 2-3 times to rinse solution away. Safety Warning Cdo not use for enamel or zinc coated appliances, with the exception ofappliances that have acid-resistant enamel. Always consult the instructions for use and directions manual. Keep away from compustable materials, oxidising agents, reducing agents, bases and metal nitrates. Avoid contact with eyes and skin. Wear suitable prprotective clothing, gloves and eye/face protection when using. In case of contact with eyes, immediately flush with plenty of water for at least 15 minutes, occasionally lifting the upper and lower eyelids. If wearing contact lenses, remove and continue flushing with plenty of water for at least 15 minutes and then obtain medical attention immediately. In case of contact with skin, immediately flush skin copiously with water for at least 15 minutes while removing any contaminated clothing and shoes. Wash clothing before re-use. Clean shoes thoroughly beffore re-use. Obtain medical attention immediatelyif irritation persists. Harmful if swallowed. If swallowed, wash mouth out with water and seek medical advice immediately, showing the label. Do not induce vomiting unless directed to do so by medical personnel. Wash hands after handling product. Deliberately inhaling fumes can be harmful. Only for use in ventilated rooms. In case of inhalation remove from exposure and move to fresh air immediately, if breathing becomes difficult obtain medical attention immediately. The product is not considered harmful to aquatic organisms nor to cause long-term adverse effects in the environment. Box Contains Each order comes with 4 x 20g Keep-It Handy Descaler Tablets All Purpose Tablets See more
